title: SMB
author: SMB
created_time: November 19, 2023, 02:04:30 PMLast edit: November 19, 2023, 02:15:13 PM by SMB
content: Have USDT ERC20 on Coinbase lookin for XMRWIl only transfer to your Coinbase AccountPlease send Pm with % you ask to swapMaybe about 80% . I am done with Coinbase.Scammers stay away. Smell you from far away.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Why do you want so much an internal transfer on Coinbase?If you withdraw from Coinbase, you can exchange USDT to XMR without KYC (and without account): https://exch.cx/This service is legit, you can do your own researches about it if you want.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: SMB on November 19, 2023, 02:04:30 PMHave USDT ERC20 on Coinbase lookin for XMRWIl only transfer to your Coinbase AccountYou would get a much better and quicker deal if you didn't have to transfer to one's Coinbase account. After all, what is required for transfer is just ERC20 address. What is so special with coinbase that you want to do a transfer to a person owing an account there?How about us who don't like that coinbase KYC? Do we stand any chance?

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on November 19, 2023, 09:54:28 PMQuote from: SMB on November 19, 2023, 02:04:30 PMHave USDT ERC20 on Coinbase lookin for XMRWIl only transfer to your Coinbase AccountYou would get a much better and quicker deal if you didn't have to transfer to one's Coinbase account. After all, what is required for transfer is just ERC20 address. What is so special with coinbase that you want to do a transfer to a person owing an account there?How about us who don't like that coinbase KYC? Do we stand any chance?I don't know how Coinbase works nowadays but sometimes they won't allow someone to withdraw to a 3rd party wallet for whatever reason. Whoever takes this deal needs to be careful.

Whoever takes this deal needs to be careful.

comments.body: Coinbase is SHIT people.All those rules these days.I am not going to explain why.I dont care if i need to go upfront to an account reputable member.
